body: What a massive wall of text she’d left. I couldn’t even tell what she was talking about until I went to the very top:
"have u seen the new trailer for mmsr???" That stood for Metalmask: The Slow Rust.
"they brought back Symphony im SHRIEKING i knew they would"
"but why tf SPOIL it in the"
I couldn't hande it. At least not then.

content.name: I thought that should do for now.

options.true: I wrote to her, "I’m studying. We can talk later."
options.false: I closed my eyes and let out a deep sigh as the screen shut to black.
